description: I am an international-oriented professional with exceptional communication skills and the ability to work in pressure environments. I consider myself as an enthusiastic and emphatic leader and team player used to working with autonomy and under a target-orientated business strategy. “Thinking out of the box” natural facilitator always applying creative solving problem dynamics and “human first“ methodologies at the workplace.
